Description: On I-64 at mile marker 289.6 in the City of Chesapeake, near Greenbrier Parkway, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The west outside left shoulder and left lane are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 172 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left center lane, right center lane, right inside center lane, right outside lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
